profile.summary: Senior Lead Software Engineer with over 10+ years of experience in the fintech sector, specializing in high-scale application architecture, fault-tolerant systems, and cross-functional team leadership. Proven track record of orchestrating global engineering teams under Kanban methodologies to deliver next-generation banking solutions. Expert in driving DevOps modernization, AI enablement, and SRE best practices while ensuring strict regulatory governance for international payment systems.

highlights.label: Engineering Leadership
highlights.text: Created and currently lead a cross-functional engineering division operating on a Kanban model, overseeing three critical workstreams: DevOps, Cross-Cutting Solutions (Libraries, AI Enablement, Architecture), and SRE.

highlights.label: Team Management
highlights.text: Manage a hierarchy including three technical leads, developers, and a Program Manager. Enforced standardization across global time zones to accelerate delivery cycles and streamline development hygiene.

highlights.label: Product Delivery
highlights.text: Spearheading the architectural design and feature rollout of a new Commercial Banking Portal for middle-market clients, enabling seamless cross-country payments and account reviews.

highlights.label: Governance & Compliance
highlights.text: Direct the governance strategy for payment systems,ensuring strict adherence to international banking standards, data fitness, and regulatory information flows. Innovation: Leading "Rapid Prototyping deployment pipelines " and "AI Enablement" initiatives to integrate large language models (LLMs) and automation into banking workflows.

highlights.label: Modernization
highlights.text: Led the modernization effort to migrate legacy systems to cloud-native architectures, ensuring systems remained current with the latest technology stacks.

highlights.label: Tooling Development
highlights.text: Architected and developed the "Jules" library, a custom solution designed to facilitate "shift-left" testing patterns and streamline Kubernetes deployments.

highlights.label: CI/CD Optimization
highlights.text: Developed and maintained robust CI/CD pipelines for multiple high-impact projects.

highlights.label: Mentorship
highlights.text: Led a team of developers, fostering a culture of continuous learning and guiding junior staff.

highlights.label: Full Stack Delivery
highlights.text: Delivered full-stack applications utilizing JavaScript and Java.

highlights.label: Full Stack Development
highlights.text: Developed customer-facing single-page applications (SPAs) using JavaScript and Java Spring Framework, integrating third-party APIs and handling high-volume data transactions.

highlights.label: Architecture & Risk
highlights.text: Instrumental in establishing software architectures by researching existing systems, identifying complexities, and mitigating potential implementation risks.

highlights.label: Performance
highlights.text: Provided Subject Matter Expertise (SME) for a major banking initiative, resulting in a 3% Year-over-Year increase in user growth.

highlights.label: Code Quality
highlights.text: Managed code quality and unit test coverage, enforcing best coding practices and reducing technical debt.

highlights.label: Optimization
highlights.text: Tracked and managed Cross Browser Compatibility issues and managed web optimization, including CSS Sprites and best practices.

highlights.label: Development
highlights.text: Developed customer-based applications and architected solutions to handle high volumes of data.

highlights.label: System Design
highlights.text: Delivered hands-on support in designing, estimating, planning, and implementing IT system-related business solutions.

highlights.label: Framework Architecture
highlights.text: Engineered TaskWeave, an agentic framework allowing users to define atomic tasks (LLM prompts, API calls, data analysis) via JSON configuration.

highlights.label: Dynamic Orchestration
highlights.text: Leveraged LangGraph and LangChain to dynamically chain tools together, automating complex chains of reasoning.

highlights.label: AI Integration
highlights.text: Integrated OpenAI APIs to generate contextual insights, enabling the system to expand easily into multi- agent or specialist workflows. Impact: Enabled rapid prototyping of agentic workflows with reusable logic, reducing the time required to deploy complex AI reasoning chains.

education.degree: Master of Science in Computer Engineering

education.school: The London School of Economics and Political Science

certifications.name: Project Management Foundations Communication & Managing Your Manager
